properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make me a blessing make me a blessing Out of my life may Jesus shine Make me a blessing O Savior I pray Make me a blessing to someone today{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Out in the highways and byways of life Many are weary and sad Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife Making the sorrowing glad{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tell the sweet story of Christ and His love Tell of His pow'r to forgive Others will trust Him if only you prove True ev'ry moment you live{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give as 'twas given to you in your need Love as the Master loved you Be to the helpless a helper indeed Unto your mission be true{/lang-eng}
